intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must be updated whenever blocker status changes to maintain day‑to‑day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be granted before importing assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark once macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture becomes available in the automation environment.
macOS hardware with a 1 GiB performance fixture must be present in the current automation environment before running the benchmark.
Publish performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 after manual profiling and benchmarking tasks are completed.
All manual profiling steps (render time <100 ms, memory allocation <5 MB, 60 FPS on device) must be documented in a performance report before publishing baselines.
Publish performance benchmarks for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 after multi‑platform testing is completed.

Build time must be <10s for a clean build, binary size <500KB release, memory footprint <5MB per screen, 60 FPS during interactions, and BoxTreePattern with 1000+ nodes must perform within acceptable limits before CI integration.
Compile cross‑platform test results and create a cross‑platform report after testing on iOS 17+, macOS 14+, and iPadOS 17+ devices and simulators is finished.
All listed device configurations, dark mode, RTL language, and locale/region tests must be executed before compiling the report.
Achieve final accessibility sign‑off for FoundationUI after manual VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, reduce motion, contrast, and bold text testing is completed.
Manual accessibility testing must confirm 98%+ accessibility score and cover all edge cases before final sign‑off.

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Assets
functional_units.description: Import licensed media assets and refresh regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export validation

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Run lenient vs strict benchmark on macOS with 1 GiB payload, collect runtime and RSS metrics, archive results

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publish performance baseline data in PERFORMANCE.md after profiling

functional_units.name: Generate Performance Report
functional_units.description: Document findings from Xcode Instruments profiling (render time, memory, FPS) into a report

functional_units.name: Create Benchmark Metrics Report
functional_units.description: Record benchmark metrics such as build time, binary size, memory footprint, FPS and BoxTreePattern performance

functional_units.name: Compile Cross-Platform Test Results
functional_units.description: Collect and compile test results across iOS, mac‑to­s and iPadOS for a cross‑platform report

functional_units.name: Finalize Accessibility Sign-Off
functional_units.description: Complete manual accessibility testing and finalise the …
